Working with over 50+ global brands!","details":"https://docs.arianee.org","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ERC721EnumerableForbiddenBatchMint()":[{"details":"Batch mint is not allowed."}],"ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,address)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.","params":{"tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721OutOfBoundsIndex(address,uint256)":[{"details":"An `owner`'s token query was out of bounds for `index`. NOTE: The owner being `address(0)` indicates a global out of bounds index."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"InvalidInitialization()":[{"details":"The contract is already initialized."}],"NotInitializing()":[{"details":"The contract is not initializing."}]},"events":{"Approval(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token."},"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets."},"Initialized(uint64)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`."},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addTokenAccess(uint256,address,bool,uint256)":{"details":"Must be called by an operator","params":{"_accessType":"Type of access (0 = view, 1 = transfer)","_enable":"Enable or disable the access","_key":"Public key of the new access (derived from a private key or a passphrase)","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-balanceOf}."},"canOperate(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_operator":"Operator address","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"},"returns":{"_0":"true if the operator is valid"}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor"},"destroy(uint256)":{"details":"Must be called by the issuer","params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-getApproved}."},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"hydrateToken(uint256,bytes32,string,address,uint256,bool,address,bool)":{"details":"Must be called by an authorized addressMust have an `_issuer` param that is an operator of the SmartAssetCan only be called once","params":{"_imprint":"Imprint (hash of the SmartAsset data)","_initialKey":"Public key of the initial access (derived from a private key or a passphrase)","_initialKeyIsRequestKey":"Enable the initial key also as a request key","_issuer":"Address of the issuer (the one that has `reserveToken` the SmartAsset may not be the issuer)","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID","_tokenRecoveryTimestamp":"Maximum timestamp for the recovery of the SmartAsset by the issuer throught the `recoverTokenToIssuer` function","_uri":"URI"}},"isAccessValid(uint256,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"_accessType":"Type of access (0 = view, 1 = transfer)","_hash":"Keccak256 hash of the SmartAsset ID and the new owner address `keccak256(abi.encode(_tokenId, _newOwner))`","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-isApprovedForAll}."},"isRequestable(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"isSoulbound(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"isTrustedForwarder(address)":{"details":"Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder."},"issuerOf(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"name()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-name}."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"recoverTokenToIssuer(uint256)":{"details":"Must be called by the issuer and before the recovery timestamp","params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"recoveryRequestOpen(uint256)":{"params":{"_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"requestToken(uint256,bytes32,bool,address,bytes)":{"details":"Must be called with a valid signature according to the current accessMust be called by an authorized address","params":{"_hash":"Keccak256 hash of the SmartAsset ID and the new owner address `keccak256(abi.encode(_tokenId, _newOwner))`","_keepCurrentAccess":"Keep the current access after the transfer","_newOwner":"Address of the new owner","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"reserveToken(uint256,address)":{"details":"Must be called by an authorized address","params":{"_to":"Address of the new owner","_tokenId":"SmartAsset ID"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. addTokenAccess(uint256,address,bool,uint.details: Must be called by an operator

params._key: Public key of the new access (derived from a private key or a passphrase)

returns._0: true if the operator is valid

destroy(uint256).details: Must be called by the issuer

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

hydrateToken(uint256,bytes32,string,addr.details: Must be called by an authorized addressMust have an `_issuer` param that is an operator of the SmartAssetCan only be called once

params._initialKey: Public key of the initial access (derived from a private key or a passphrase)
params._initialKeyIsRequestKey: Enable the initial key also as a request key
params._issuer: Address of the issuer (the one that has `reserveToken` the SmartAsset may not be the issuer)
params._tokenRecoveryTimestamp: Maximum timestamp for the recovery of the SmartAsset by the issuer throught the `recoverTokenToIssuer` function

params._hash: Keccak256 hash of the SmartAsset ID and the new owner address `keccak256(abi.encode(_tokenId, _newOwner))`

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recoverTokenToIssuer(uint256).details: Must be called by the issuer and before the recovery timestamp

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestToken(uint256,bytes32,bool,addres.details: Must be called with a valid signature according to the current accessMust be called by an authorized address

params._hash: Keccak256 hash of the SmartAsset ID and the new owner address `keccak256(abi.encode(_tokenId, _newOwner))`
params._keepCurrentAccess: Keep the current access after the transfer

reserveToken(uint256,address).details: Must be called by an authorized address

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Dispatch the rewards at the first transfer of a SmartAsset

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

updateRecoveryRequest(uint256,bool).details: Must be called by the issuer

params._active: New status of the recovery request

updateTokenURI(uint256,string).details: Must be called by the issuer

validRecoveryRequest(uint256).details: Can be only called if a recovery request is active and by the `ROLE_ADMIN` of this contract

addTokenAccess(uint256,address,bool,uint.notice: Add an access to a given SmartAsset

canOperate(uint256,address).notice: Check if an operator is valid for a given SmartAsset

hydrateToken(uint256,bytes32,string,addr.notice: Hydrate (populate) a SmartAsset with a given set of data

isAccessValid(uint256,bytes32,uint256,by.notice: Check if an access is valid

isRequestable(uint256).notice: Check if a SmartAsset is requestable

isSoulbound(uint256).notice: Check if a SmartAsset is soulbound

issuerOf(uint256).notice: Returns the issuer of a given SmartAsset

recoverTokenToIssuer(uint256).notice: Recover a SmartAsset to the issuer

recoveryRequestOpen(uint256).notice: Returns the recovery request status for a given SmartAsset

requestToken(uint256,bytes32,bool,addres.notice: Transfer the ownership of a SmartAsset to a new owner

reserveToken(uint256,address).notice: Mint a new SmartAsset with a given ID

setUriBase(string).notice: Set the base URI for all SmartAssets

tokenCreation(uint256).notice: Returns the creation date of a given SmartAsset

tokenHashedAccess(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the access of a given SmartAsset for a given type

tokenImprint(uint256).notice: Returns the imprint of a given SmartAsset

tokenRecoveryDate(uint256).notice: Returns the recovery timestamp for a given SmartAsset

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Override of the `transferFrom` function that perform multiple checks depending on the SmartAsset type

updateRecoveryRequest(uint256,bool).notice: Update the status of a recovery request

updateTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Update the URI of a given SmartAsset

validRecoveryRequest(uint256).notice: Validate a recovery request and transfer the SmartAsset to the issuer
